name: ExeCUTE (Elukka)
description:
ExeCUTE is a mechanical mixup of different puzzle genres resulting in lots of chain explosions! 

Swipe (mobile) or use arrow keys (PC) to move all pieces up, down, left or right. 

Create matches of three or more to score explosive combo chains! Game ends once the board is full.

PLAY NOW: http://bit.ly/ExeCUTE

TEAM 204CRUSH
Mikko "Mishicu "Aaltio -  Music & Sound Design
Matti Isotalo - UI, UI Art, logo
Emppu Nurminen - Visual Artist
Henri Sarasvirta - Programming 
Joel Setterberg - Programming
